translation.en: -♪ We're gonna make it home... ♪ -Run complete.
[automated voice] Well done, Emily. Five point three miles. Forty-one minutes.
translation.it: Ben fatto, Emily. Otto chilometri e mezzo. Quarantuno minuti.

translation.en: Eighteen seconds faster than yesterday.
translation.it: Diciotto secondi più veloce di ieri.

translation.en: -Good effort. -[exhales]
-[indistinct chatter] -[gasps] Madeline, you're in Adweek.
What? Where?
Right here, under "Movers and Shakers."
-[Madeline] Ah! -"Chicago-based Gilbert Group expands international portfolio
translation.it: "Gilbert Group di Chicago espande il portfolio internazionale

translation.en: with acquisition of French luxury marketing company Savoir.
translation.it: acquisendo l'agenzia francese di marketing di lusso Savoir.

translation.en: Gilbert Group vet, Madeline Wheeler, named director of marketing for Franco firm."
translation.it: Madeline Wheeler, veterana del gruppo, nominata direttrice marketing."

translation.en: Yes! I am here to prove that a master's in French does not go to waste.
translation.it: Sì! Dimostrerò che un Master in francese non va sprecato.

translation.en: -This is going to be amazing for you. -[Madeline sighs]
I have been dreaming of moving to Paris forever.
translation.it: Ho sempre sognato di trasferirmi a Parigi.

translation.en: I mean, French men, they love older women, you know?
translation.it: I francesi amano le donne più grandi.

translation.en: Look at their president. He's young. He's hot. -He married his schoolteacher. -[Emily laughs]
translation.it: Guarda il presidente: giovane, sexy, ha sposato la sua insegnante.

translation.en: Ooh, I just emailed you my thoughts on the presentation for the new IBS drug.
translation.it: Ti ho inviato le mie idee sul nuovo farmaco per l'IBS.

translation.en: It's a social initiative to add meditation to your medication.
translation.it: È un'iniziativa social per aggiungere la meditazione ai farmaci.

translation.en: If you like it, you can pitch it later. Uh, you know, for your last hurrah.
translation.it: Puoi presentarlo più tardi. Sai, per il tuo ultimo show.

translation.en: -I want you to pitch it. -Seriously?
translation.it: Presentalo tu. - Sul serio? - Sul serio.

translation.en: Seriously. The client has to start getting comfortable with you.
translation.it: - Sul serio? - Sul serio. Il cliente deve abituarsi a te.

translation.en: I don't want to step on your toes.
You're not. You're stepping into my shoes. You're ready, okay?
translation.it: Stai per subentrarmi e sei pronta, ok?

translation.en: This is an opportunity for both of us. Come here. Try this.
translation.it: È un'opportunità per entrambe. Prova questo.

translation.en: What is it?
De L'Heure.
It's the latest fragrance from Maison Lavaux.
translation.it: È l'ultimo profumo della Maison Lavaux.

translation.en: I'll be handling them, their account in Paris. What do you think?
translation.it: Mi occuperò io di loro a Parigi. Che ne pensi?

translation.en: It's like wearing poetry.
[snaps fingers] I'm gonna use that.
Oh, that smells really wei-- Does that smell weird to you?
translation.it: Ha un odore molto... Non ti sembra strano?

translation.en: -No, just floral. -But...
I'm gonna be sick. Uh... I'm gonna be sick.
-Hi, babe! -[boyfriend] Hey. Oh.
-Yes! -What happened?
Bote just smacked a walk-off grand slam, two outs left in the bottom of the ninth.
translation.it: Bote ha fatto un grande slam. Due out rimasti al nono inning.

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Hell yeah!
Yeah! Cubs are goin' to the playoffs, baby!
translation.it: Sì! I Cubs andranno ai playoff!

translation.en: -Can we get a couple of beers here? -[Emily] White wine, actually.
translation.it: - Due birre, per favore. - Per me vino bianco.

translation.en: -Anything French, if you have it. -[server] For sure.
I have some crazy news.
-Madeline's pregnant. -Madeline?
-[Emily] Mm-hm. -Like, your boss, Madeline?
translation.it: Il tuo capo, Madeline? Pensavo fosse troppo vecchia.

translation.en: -Thought she was too old to get pregnant. -Well, so did she.
translation.it: Il tuo capo, Madeline? Pensavo fosse troppo vecchia. Anche lei.

translation.en: Until she got completely nauseous sniffing this perfume
translation.it: Finché non ha avuto la nausea annusando un profumo al lavoro.

translation.en: she was planning to promote. She went to the doctor this afternoon.
translation.it: Finché non ha avuto la nausea annusando un profumo al lavoro. Ed è andata dal dottore.

translation.en: -Wow. So, who's the dad? -Oh, well, there are a few candidates.
translation.it: - Chi è il padre? - Ci sono alcuni candidati,

translation.en: -She was having a lot of going-away sex. -Hey. Go, Madeline.
translation.it: ha fatto molto sesso pre-partenza. Brava Madeline.

translation.en: But now that she's pregnant, she's decided she's not gonna take the job in Paris.
translation.it: Ora che è incinta, ha deciso che non accetterà il lavoro a Parigi.

translation.en: So, there goes your promotion?
[Emily] Not exactly. They still need someone there.
translation.it: Non esattamente. Là serve comunque qualcuno.

translation.en: Like, American eyes and ears to help with the whole transition.
translation.it: Occhi e orecchie americane per agevolare la transizione.

translation.en: So they asked me if I would take the job...
translation.it: Hanno chiesto a me se volessi il lavoro.

translation.en: for a year.
What? In Paris? [chuckles]
They said that if I did that they'd guarantee me senior brand manager when I'm back.
translation.it: Se lo faccio, al mio ritorno sarò senior manager.

translation.en: So, the apartment there is already all set up, and there's a relocation bonus.
translation.it: L'appartamento è già pronto e avrò un bonus per il trasferimento.

translation.en: And just to explore the idea,
here's a spreadsheet I made for the next year.
translation.it: ecco un programma per il prossimo anno.

translation.en: Weeks when you might be able to come to Paris,
times I can come back to Chicago,
taking into consideration vacation and sick days.
translation.it: Sfruttando vacanze e giorni di malattia.

translation.en: Wait.
You're serious?
I know it's crazy, but when will we get a chance like this?
translation.it: So che è assurdo, ma quando avremo un'altra occasione così?

translation.en: -It'll be an adventure. -[boyfriend] Unless I missed something,
you don't speak French.
Fake it till you make it. [chuckles]
translation.it: Fingi finché non ce la fai.

translation.en: You look worried.
Oh, I'm not worried. It's the French who should be worried.
translation.it: Non sono preoccupato. I francesi dovrebbero esserlo.

translation.en: -Uh, Emily Cooper? -[Emily] Yes.
Hey. I'm Gilles Dufour from the rental agency.
-Hi. Bonjour. -Bonjour. [chuckles]
-I've got your keys. Apartment 501. -["Summer in Paris" playing]
-Hi. -♪ A s'il vous plaît ♪
-♪ Goes a long way... ♪ -The building is very old.
translation.it: L'edificio è molto vecchio. Non ha l'ascensore.

translation.en: -It doesn't have an elevator. -[panting] Okay.
translation.it: L'edificio è molto vecchio. Non ha l'ascensore. Fa nulla.

translation.en: It's charming. [grunts]
[groans] Is this it?
[panting] It's on the fifth floor.
-This is the fourth floor. -[Emily] Uh,
I just schlepped up these bags five flights. -This is the fifth floor. -[Gilles sighs]
translation.it: Ho trascinato i bagagli per cinque rampe, è il quinto.

translation.en: In France, first the ground floor,
translation.it: In Francia, il primo è il piano terra,

translation.en: then the first floor, then the second floor, and so on.
translation.it: poi c'è il primo, poi il secondo e così via.

translation.en: That's weird.
Et voilà. Your magnificent chambre de bonne.
translation.it: Et voilà. La tua magnifica chambre de bonne.

translation.en: Chambre de what now?
Chambre de b-- Um, it means, uh, the room for the housekeeper.
translation.it: Chambre de... Significa la stanza per la governante.

translation.en: The top two floors were typically reserved for the servants.
translation.it: Gli ultimi due piani erano in genere per la servitù.

translation.en: The space is small, but the view...
translation.it: Lo spazio è piccolo, ma la vista…

translation.en: Oh, my God, I feel like Nicole Kidman in Moulin Rouge!
translation.it: Oddio, mi sento Nicole Kidman in Moulin Rouge.

translation.en: You've got all of Paris at your feet.
There is a wonderful café just down below.
-A friend of mine is the manager. -[Emily] Wow.
translation.it: - Lo gestisce un mio amico. - Wow.

translation.en: -So, ça va ? It's good? -[Emily takes a deep breath]
Oui. Oui. Très good.
-Très wonderful. [chuckles] -Great.
Are you hungry? Would you like to have a coffee or...?
translation.it: Hai fame? Ti va un caffè o...

translation.en: Oh, actually, I have to get to my office.
Oh. Maybe you want to have a drink tonight?
I have a boyfriend.
-In Paris? -[Emily] In Chicago.
-So you don't have a boyfriend in Paris. -[both chuckle]
translation.it: Quindi non hai un ragazzo a Parigi.

translation.en: -Can I just get my keys, s'il vous plaît ? -[Gilles] Yeah.
translation.it: - Posso avere le chiavi, s'il vous plaît? - Sì.

translation.en: Um, my number is on the card if you need me for anything,
translation.it: Il mio numero è sul biglietto, se ti serve,

translation.en: -and in case you change your mind. -I won't.
translation.it: - e se cambi idea. - Non lo farò.

translation.en: -Bye-bye, now. -Yeah.
-["Lunatique" playing] -[camera shutter clicks]
Hi. Hello.
Uh, bonjour. I'm Emily Cooper from the Gilbert Group in Chicago.
translation.it: Bonjour. Sono Emily Cooper del Gilbert Group di Chicago.

translation.en: You are? [chuckles] I'm sorry. I don't understand.
-I'm going to be working in this office. -[cell phone beeps]
-[line beeps] -[in French] The American girl is here.
I wasn't expecting you until tomorrow.
How was your journey here? The new apartment and everything?
translation.it: Com'è andato il viaggio? Il nuovo appartamento e il resto?

translation.en: [in English, chuckling] You lost me at bonjour.
Yeah, I was told the American coming here spoke French.
translation.it: Mi hanno detto che l'americana parlava francese.

translation.en: Oh, that was Madeline.
Oh, so you're not Madeline.
Uh, I'm Emily. Emily Cooper. And I am so excited to be here.
translation.it: Sono Emily, Emily Cooper. E sono molto felice di essere qui.

translation.en: Well, that's very unfortunate. [sighs softly]
-Excuse me? -That you don't speak French.
It's a problem.
Well, I'm going to take a class, but... [American accent] ...je parle un peu français already.
translation.it: Beh, vado a lezione, ma già je parle un peu français.

translation.en: Well, perhaps it's better not to try.
-[knocking on door] -Oh, Paul.
May I introduce Emily, the American girl who's come to work with us?
translation.it: Ti presento Emily, la ragazza americana che lavorerà con noi.

translation.en: This is Monsieur Brossard, he's the founder of Savoir.
translation.it: Lui è Monsieur Brossard, il fondatore di Savoir.

translation.en: -Ah. Emily Cooper. Oh. -[Paul] Hello.
It is so nice to meet you, Monsieur Brossard.
It's a pleasure. Welcome to Paris.
translation.it: È un piacere. Benvenuta a Parigi.

translation.en: So, you've come to teach the French some American tricks?
translation.it: Sei venuta a insegnare ai francesi dei trucchi americani?

translation.en: I'm sure we have a lot to learn from each other.
But your experience is not with fashion
translation.it: Ma non sei esperta di moda

translation.en: -and luxury brands, hm? -[Emily] True.
Most of my experience has been in promoting pharmaceuticals and geriatric care facilities.
translation.it: Soprattutto promozione farmaceutica e strutture geriatriche.

translation.en: In Chicago.
Yes. I mean, oui.
I was in Chicago once, -and I ate the deep-dish pizza. -Ah.
translation.it: Sono stato a Chicago e ho mangiato la pizza deep-dish.

translation.en: That is our specialty. We take a lot of pride.
translation.it: È la nostra specialità. Ne siamo orgogliosi.

translation.en: It was, uh, dégueulasse. How you say?
-Disgusting. -[Paul chuckles]
-Like a quiche made of cement. -Uh...
Oh, no, you must have gone to Lou Malnati's.
And the people are so fat. Why are they all so fat?
translation.it: E la gente è così grassa. Perché sono tutti così grassi?

translation.en: Well, perhaps from the disgusting food.
translation.it: Beh, forse per il cibo disgustoso.

translation.en: True, we are in the midst of an obesity epidemic.
In fact, Merck was one of our biggest clients.
translation.it: Merck era uno dei nostri clienti di punta.

translation.en: They make a diabetes drug that we marketed the heck out of. Sales went up 63 percent.
translation.it: Fanno un farmaco per il diabete. Le vendite sono aumentate del 63%.

translation.en: So you create the disease, then you treat the disease,
translation.it: Quindi create la malattia, poi la curate

translation.en: and then you market the treatments of the disease.
-Well... -Perhaps stop eating.
-There is no money in that. -True.
Cigarettes cause diabetes and cancer.
translation.it: Le sigarette causano diabete e cancro.

translation.en: Yes. [chuckles] Well, smoking is a pleasure.
translation.it: Sì. Beh, fumare è un piacere.

translation.en: And without pleasure, who are we?
-German? -[Paul chuckling]
Exactly right.
All of the brands we market here, from perfume to cognac to couture,
translation.it: Tutti i marchi che promuoviamo, dal profumo, al cognac, alla moda,

translation.en: -are all to do with beauty and refinement. -[Emily] Mm-hmm.
translation.it: sono legati alla bellezza e alla raffinatezza.

translation.en: Perhaps you have something to learn from us,
translation.it: Forse voi avete qualcosa da imparare da noi,

translation.en: but I'm not sure if we have much to learn from you.
translation.it: ma non so se noi abbiamo molto da imparare da voi.

translation.en: With all due respect, I have been sent here for a reason,
translation.it: Con rispetto, sono qui per un motivo.

translation.en: so if you wouldn't mind, I would really like to share some of my ideas about your social media strategies.
translation.it: Quindi vorrei condividere alcune idee sulle vostre strategie social.

translation.en: You mean the Twitter and the Snapchat?
Yes. And the Instagram.
Ah, by all means.
[clicks tongue] First, let me apologize for speaking English.
translation.it: Prima di tutto, scusate se parlo in inglese.

translation.en: I did Rosetta Stone on the plane, but it hasn't kicked in yet.
translation.it: Ho seguito Rosetta Stone sull'aereo, ma non l'ho ancora assimilato.

translation.en: -[Paul sighs] -Oh, Patricia doesn't speak English.
Please continue.
For those of you who haven't met me, I'm Emily Cooper,
translation.it: Per chi non mi conosce, sono Emily Cooper

translation.en: and I'm so excited to be here in Paris.
translation.it: e sono felice di essere a Parigi.

translation.en: I'm looking forward to getting to know each and every one of you
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di conoscere ognuno di voi

translation.en: and, likewise, having you get to know me.
translation.it: e di farmi conoscere da voi.

translation.en: Your name, monsieur?
My name is Luc.
Yes, Luc?
Why are you shouting?
[sighs, quietly] Sorry.
Your company works with some of the biggest brands
translation.it: La vostra azienda lavora con dei grandi marchi di lusso,

translation.en: in the luxury sector, from Chanel to YSL.
translation.it: La vostra azienda lavora con dei grandi marchi di lusso, da Chanel a YSL.

translation.en: And that makes Savoir, your company, or, if I may be so bold,
translation.it: E questo rende la vostra azienda o, se posso azzardarmi,

translation.en: our company, a brand in itself.
translation.it: la nostra, un marchio in sé.

translation.en: But to build a brand, you must create meaningful social media engagement.
translation.it: Ma per costruire un marchio serve coinvolgimento sui social.

translation.en: May I ask who's responsible for your social media here?
translation.it: Chi è il responsabile dei social media?

translation.en: Makes sense.
[inhales sharply] Anyway, it's not just about the number of followers.
translation.it: Comunque, non si tratta solo di follower.

translation.en: It's about content, trust, interest, and engagement.
translation.it: Ma di contenuti, fiducia, interesse e coinvolgimento.

translation.en: Excuse me, but the French are masters of social media.
translation.it: Scusami, ma i francesi sono maestri dei social media.

translation.en: True.
But Americans invented it,
translation.it: Ma gli americani li hanno inventati.

translation.en: which is why I hope to become a valuable member of your team
translation.it: Perciò spero di diventare preziosa per il team,

translation.en: by adding an American point of view to your fabulous French clients.
translation.it: aggiungendo un punto di vista americano ai vostri favolosi clienti francesi.

translation.en: [in French] It's a disaster.
-[Paul] What? -Who is that girl?
It was one of the terms of the sale. -They send us one of their people. -[boss sighs]
translation.it: Era una delle condizioni. Ci mandano uno dei loro.

translation.en: -How long do we have to put up with this? -[sighs] Well, until she decides to leave.
translation.it: - Per quanto dovrò sopportarla? - Finché non decide di andarsene.

translation.en: With me as her boss, we'll see how long she lasts.
translation.it: Con me come suo capo, vedremo quanto durerà.

translation.en: Right, I have to go.
[Emily, in English] It's amazing, isn't it?
The entire city looks like Ratatouille.
It's beautiful.
So beautiful.
[boyfriend] Ah. Hey, how was the first day? Great.
translation.it: - Com'è andato il primo giorno? - Benissimo!

translation.en: Okay, maybe a few things got lost in translation.
translation.it: Ok, forse qualcosa si è perso con la traduzione.

translation.en: It took them a minute to realize I was me and not Madeline,
translation.it: Non hanno capito subito che non ero Madeline,

translation.en: but I really feel like I could be a big asset here.
translation.it: ma credo che sarò una grande risorsa.

translation.en: Hey, look what I got.
[Emily gasps] Thank God! You're gonna love Paris.
translation.it: Grazie a Dio! Parigi ti piacerà.

translation.en: I don't want to spend another day in the most romantic city in the world
translation.it: Non voglio stare senza di te nella città più romantica del mondo.

translation.en: -without you. -I'll be there soon, okay?
Hurry. I miss you already here.
Bye.
-[door slams heavily] -[Emily] Ugh, seriously?
God.
[softly] Okay.
Come on.
[grunts] This can't be happening. Come on.
Sorry, I... I thought this was my apartment. Fifth floor?
translation.it: Scusa, pensavo fosse il mio appartamento. Quinto piano?

translation.en: This is the fourth floor.
Fifth floor.
Right.
[chuckles] Uh, I'm Emily. Emily Cooper, your... your new neighbor.
translation.it: Sono Emily. Emily Cooper, la tua nuova vicina.

translation.en: American?
Oui. From Chicago.
Gabriel, French, from Normandy.
[gasps softly] Oh, I know that beach. Saving Private Ryan.
translation.it: Conosco quella spiaggia. Salvate il soldato Ryan.

translation.en: -What? -D-Day?
-Uh, anyway. -[both chuckle]
Nice to meet you, neighbor.
[in French] Good morning, miss.
Merci. Have un bonne journée.
translation.it: Merci. Le auguro un bonne journée.

translation.en: -♪ Get back to the beat... ♪ -[in English] Oh, my God.
-♪ We ain't got no hope ♪ -Oh, my God.
-♪ Surrounded by the moonlight, baby ♪ -Mm. Oh, my God.
Sylvie, it's Emily. Um, are we closed today,
translation.it: Sylvie, sono Emily. Siamo chiusi oggi?

translation.en: or is there a national holiday I don't know about?
'Cause I've been hanging around here for two hours and...
translation.it: Perché sono qui da due ore e...

translation.en: -[brakes squeak] -What are you doing?
I've been here since 8:30.
Pourquoi ? We open at 10:30.
-[cell phone chimes softly] -[energetic music playing]
Hi Patricia. I'm wondering if I can share some ideas I have
translation.it: Ciao, Patricia. Posso condividere alcune mie idee

translation.en: about how we might enhance our social media engagement.
translation.it: su come migliorare il coinvolgimento sui social?

translation.en: I'm so excited about the potential here.
[translator, in French] Patricia, I'd like to share some ideas
about how we might enhance our social media engagement.
translation.it: su come migliorare il coinvolgimento sui social.

translation.en: -[in English] Do you wanna have lunch? -No, I'll have a cigarette.
translation.it: Ti va di pranzare? No, mi fumo una sigaretta.

translation.en: Uh, I have a... bad stomach.
[clicks tongue] I have a previous engagement.
-Excusez-moi ! [sighs] -[woman] Laurent! Sybil!
[in Mandarin] Apologize to the lady!
[in French] I'm sorry. Can I buy you another one?
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Posso comprartene un altro?

translation.en: [in English] Sorry, I don't speak French.
-Ah, American? -[Emily] Yes.
But did you think that I was French?
Honestly, no. I was being polite. You... look American.
translation.it: Onestamente no, ero solo educata. Sembri americana.

translation.en: Are you from Indiana?
-Chicago. -[woman] Oh. I was close.
I went to junior high in Indianapolis.
translation.it: Ho fatto le medie a Indianapolis.

translation.en: -Oh, cool. No way! Why? -[woman] Mm-hm.
Ah, long story.
Very boring. [chuckles] The story and... Indianapolis.
translation.it: Molto noiosa. La storia. E Indianapolis.

translation.en: But the girls, they look like you. Nice.
-Are those your children? -[woman] No, I'm their nanny.
translation.it: - Sono i tuoi figli? - No, sono la tata.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Laurent! Stay where I can see you.
[sighs, in English] I'm teaching them Mandarin.
How long have you been here?
Uh... almost a year. From Shanghai.
translation.it: Quasi un anno. Vengo da Shanghai.

translation.en: But my mother's from Korea. Another long, boring story.
translation.it: Ma mia madre è coreana. - Un'altra lunga storia. - E ti piace?

translation.en: -Do you love it? -Uh, yes, of course I love Paris.
translation.it: - Un'altra lunga storia. - E ti piace? Oh, sì, certo che mi piace Parigi.

translation.en: -And the food is so delicious. -[Emily] Mm.
The fashion, so chic.
The lights, so magical.
But the people... so mean.
translation.it: Ma la gente è proprio cattiva.

translation.en: -I mean, they can't all be mean. -Oh, yes, they can.
translation.it: - Non possono esserlo tutti. - Oh, sì.

translation.en: Chinese people are mean behind your back. -French people, mean to your face. -[Emily] Mm.
translation.it: I cinesi sono cattivi alle tue spalle. I francesi, in faccia.

translation.en: -But you're on vacation here, so... -Oh, no. Actually, I work here.
translation.it: - Ma tu sei in vacanza... - No, in realtà lavoro qui.

translation.en: I have a job with a French marketing firm.
-[woman] Seriously? -Yeah.
Well, so you know.
Well, I just started.
-Do you have any friends in Paris? -Uh, no.
Um... but my boyfriend's coming next week to visit, so...
translation.it: Ma il mio ragazzo verrà a trovarmi.

translation.en: Are you lonely?
No... uh...
-Sometimes. [chuckles softly] -[clicks tongue] Give me your phone.
-[Emily] Uh... -Okay, so here's my number.
translation.it: Ok, ti do il mio numero.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] You're lonely, you text me, we have dinner. I'm Mindy.
translation.it: Se ti senti sola, scrivimi. Andiamo a cena. Sono Mindy.

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
-French people do this. -Oh.
-[in French] You're not my mother! -I want an ice cream!
translation.it: Non sei mia madre! Voglio un gelato!

translation.en: -[Mindy] Ugh. -[camera shutter clicks] -["Aujourd'hui" playing] -[phone locks]
[in English] What is "la plouc"?
It's a little term of endearment, like, um, mon petit chou, la plouc...
Nice. [chuckles] Don't worry about it.
-[laptop chimes] -[translator] The hick.
Sorry, I don't speak French.
Oh, I'm sorry. Um, is the seat free?
translation.it: Oh, mi dispiace. Il posto è libero?

translation.en: -Uh, yes... yes, please. Yeah. -[man] Yeah? Okay.
Thank you.
-Ah, Emily. Ah... -Luc! Hi.
I... I just want to say I am sorry for this.
translation.it: Voglio solo dire che mi dispiace.

translation.en: I... I do not agree to calling you "la plouc."
translation.it: Non ero d'accordo nel chiamarti la plouc.

translation.en: And... I can, uh...?
Y-- yes.
You know... [inhales]
-Mm, I'm good. -Ah? Okay.
You know, we are all a little afraid of you.
translation.it: Sai, abbiamo tutti un po' paura di te.

translation.en: What?
-Afraid of me? -Mm-hm.
How?
Y-- your ideas.
They are more new. Maybe they are better.
translation.it: Sono più nuove. Forse sono migliori.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Now you are here, and,
uh, maybe we feel we have to work harder,
translation.it: forse crediamo di dover lavorare di più.

translation.en: make more money.
It's a balance.
Ex-- exactly. A balance.
And I think the Americans have the wrong balance.
translation.it: E penso che gli americani abbiano l'equilibrio sbagliato.

translation.en: You live to work.
We work to live.
Yes, it's good to make money, but what you say is success,
translation.it: Sì, è bello fare soldi, ma ciò che per voi è successo,

translation.en: I say is punishment.
But... I enjoy work...
and accomplishment. It... It makes me happy.
translation.it: e sentirmi realizzata. Mi rende felice.

translation.en: Work makes you happy?
Yes. I mean, it's... it's... it's why I'm here.
translation.it: Sì. È per questo che sono qui.

translation.en: For work.
And look where it's brought me. To this beautiful city.
translation.it: E guarda dove mi ha portato, in questa bellissima città.

translation.en: Maybe you don't know what it is to be happy. [chuckles]
translation.it: Forse non sai cosa significa essere felici.

translation.en: Or maybe that's a little arrogant.
translation.it: O forse questo è un po' arrogante.

translation.en: Ah. You came to Paris and you don't speak French. That is arrogant.
translation.it: Sei venuta a Parigi e non parli francese, questo è arrogante.

translation.en: More ignorant than arrogant. [sighs]
Well, let's call it the arrogance of ignorance.
I'm sorry if I offended you.
Oh, I'm not offended by anything.
I see you tomorrow, Emily. Mm-hm?
Ah. Don't be early.
Oh, hey. There you are.
Is everything okay?
Yeah, I just finally got home from work.
It's 3:00 a.m. here.
translation.it: Sono le tre del mattino qui.

translation.en: Oh... whoops.
It's 7:00 p.m. here.
What are you doin'?
Sleeping.
I miss you so much.
And I miss you too.
-Hello? Doug? -[rustling on phone]
Get naked with me.
Are we having cybersex?
Well... if you insist.
-Hold on. [yawns] -[rustling on phone]
[sighs] You better not be recording this.
No. Never.
Oh, wow. You are so beautiful.
Mm, thanks.
Uh, so, um... [exhales]
...you do you, and...
I'll do me.
[sighs] M'kay.
[breathing heavily] That feel good?
-[exhales] Yeah. -How good?
-[pants, moans] -Oh, you're so sexy.
I feel...
Oh, my God.
I feel overwhelmed. I... [breathing heavily]
I feel like myself but not myself, and...
translation.it: Mi sento me stessa, ma non me stessa

translation.en: it's all so crazy.
It's crazy, but it's... it's nice, and...
it's kinda sexy, but...
And I...
[distorted] Oh, wow.
-Doug? Babe? -[distorted moaning]
There you are.
my God.
